subject: Doping (Sports)
Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: While his colleagues raced in Stage 6 of the Tour of California on Friday, Lance Armstrong was forced to play defense. On the Internet, though, not on his bike.
snippet: While his colleagues raced in Stage 6 of the Tour of California on Friday, Lance Armstrong was forced to play defense. On the Internet, though, not on his bike.
